channel.title: Web Hosting
channel.description: I'm looking at a web hosting plan that would cost $95.40 a year, it provides free domain registration and hosts 10 domains, it gives 2 MySQL databases and 50MB database storage, phpMyAdmin, and it has 200 subdomains, 20 per domain name, custom 404 error pages, 5 FTP accounts, 5000 MB file storage and 80GB Data Transfer... Is it worth it? I could get it for 2 or 3 years, I make $10 a month, and I get $20 every Christmas lol, so in a year I will have $160 and then I will get $140 a year to go towards it. I'll be using the site as a programming help site and I might get donations for a few different V.I.P. spots on the forums. I think I could make a little money off of it, learn a lot of stuff, and make a lot of friends ;) So do you guys think it'd be worth it? [url=http://100webspace.com/web_hosting/personal_pro_plan.html]Here's[/url] a link to the page. And if you can find a better web hosting plan for the same price, or this plan for less, TELL ME please ;D

@YourDistracted wrote:

Man those suck. The freehostia is good. If you look around you can find stuff cheaper than that and twice as good.

item.title: Web Hosting
item.dc:creator: @cow821 cow821
item.description:
@cow821 wrote:

This is from freehostia.com
Overview
Monthly price: $ 9.95
No setup fee
30 days money back
Data storage: 10,000 MB
Monthly bandwidth: 120 GB

Customer Support
Free 24/7 technical support
Detailed video tutorials
Extensive documentation
Integrated ticketing system
Response time: 1 hour

Domains and Subdomains
Hosting for 10 domains
200 subdomains

Free features
FREE domain name
Elefante free scripts (?)
FrontPage Extensions

Site Statistics
Access and error logs
Webalizer statistics
Detailed bandwidth stats

E-mail Features
unlimited POP3 accounts
unlimited Email aliases
Mailing list
SpamAssassin protection
E-mail filters
Webmail service
POP3 access
Full SMTP access
Email forwarding
Email autoresponder
“Catch-all” e-mails

Scripting and Database
10 MySQL databases
70 MB MySQL DB space
Perl enabled
PHP enabled
PHPMyAdmin
Over 3,000 Perl modules

Site Management Tools
Advanced Control Panel
Multi-lingual control panel
15 FTP accounts
Web-based file manager
Misc Features
Instant account activation
SSL with certificate gen
SSI (Server Side Includes)
RAID secured data storage
Easy upgrade options

OS and Backup
Stable Linux with Apache
UPS & diesel generator

Server and Connection
Dual P4 XEON 2.8/1GB RAM
2x160GB HDDs in RAID
100 MBits conn. per server
320 GBits data center conn.
99.9% uptime guarantee
Pricing
Annual fee ($ 9.99/mo)

Read full topic

item.title: Web Hosting
item.dc:creator: @Zeh_Progage Zeh Progage
item.description:
@Zeh_Progage wrote:

[quote=“Kimber, post:2, topic:37850”]Yeah, it seems a nice price and if you are making money back off it then its a bonus. If i needed webspace I would most probably go with this…

Whats the bandwidth? If you have alot of people visiting the site you will need a higher bandwidth[/quote]
I think data transfer is bandwidth, lol. I don’t know really, but it says 80GB Data Transfer, so I guess I have good bandwidth

Read full topic
